Game

Class GameBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.GameBase

  • public class GameBase
extends java.lang.Object
    This creates a GUI for an instance of the Game class. It runs and sets the game visible. It also calls the background music to play.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameBase

        public GameBase(Game game,
        java.lang.String name)
        Creates a new Game Window with a Game, and the Name of the Game
        Parameters:
        game - Game to be run in the window
        name - Name of the Game to put at the top of the GUI

    • Method Detail

      • Run

        public void Run()
        Runs the game. The Game will not run until this method is called.

                           int WindowHeight)
        Sets the GUI frame's height and width
        Parameters:
        WindowWidth - Width of the GUI
        WindowHeight - Height of the GUI
